description: Built an AI-based product-matching recommendation pipeline that scaled to ~50K+ product comparisons in one process, achieving 85%+ match accuracy and reducing manual matching workload by ~80%. Engineered an API Gateway that handled ~20k+ daily requests with 90% uptime. Designed and implemented a Data Warehouse system consolidating data from 5+ business units, improving inventory accuracy and reducing manual reporting time by ~30 hours per month. Developed an internal stress-testing automation tool, cutting test setup time from 2 hours to 2 minutes and enabling more teams to validate system performance without coding. Built MCP-based servers and automation tools to generate system replies, reducing manual effort by ~70% and improving response consistency.
Teaching Go/Golang fundamentals, REST API best practices, and Microservices development through deployment.

Optimized database queries, reducing execution time from 878,67ms to 0,66ms, enhancing app speed. Increased the amount of code tested from 20% to 60%, leading to more reliable and error-free software. Enhanced system security to mitigate DDoS attacks. Technologies used: Go, PostgreSQL, Kafka.

Improved API performance to ~200ms by optimizing cache mechanisms. Increased maintainability and scalability by rewriting services from monolithic architecture to microservices (Node.js to Golang). Built in-house video transcoding and live streaming to save operational costs. Mentored interns and led small projects to enhance app functionality. Technologies used: Node.js, Go, GraphQL, gRPC, PostgreSQL, CockroachDB, Redis, NATS, Elasticsearch, Docker, AWS S3, Kubernetes.

Developed Delivery Order API that processes IoT device data like geolocation, temperature, door sensor, and SOS sensor, integrating it with external systems using Message Queue technology. Technologies used: Node.js, Express.js, PHP, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Apache, Swagger, OpenShift.
